7.10.20  3:11 am   Any predictions for the end of 2020?

Â Â Â Â Â  i believe there will be various....... holidays

7.10.20  2:53 am   Do you think hard work and talent is enough to be a successful musician (successful defined as financial sustainability) because I've been playing piano a long time and don't feel like I'm gonna ever make it a career. 

Â Â Â Â Â  do you really want to

7.10.20  2:33 am   Is making videos about learning how to make music a good tactic for figuring out how to making music? recording myself talking about the composition process feels massively helpful in realizing what I want to do but I'm worried somehow doing that too much will spoil it

Â Â Â Â Â  i dare you to spoil it................

7.10.20  2:22 am   How do I go about completing the strange task of baking bread

Â Â Â Â Â  wait until the precise moment, then stop baking the bread

7.10.20  1:51 am   what are your thoughts on pineapples

Â Â Â Â Â  i don't usually think about pineapples unless i am in the mood to be totally confused and bewildered

7.10.20  1:20 am    Can you please make another video I love them ðŸ˜ƒ

Â Â Â Â Â  that doesn't sound like enough videos, but ok

7.10.20  1:05 am   When making your songs, how do you come up with such interesting and cool chord progressions?

Â Â Â Â Â  it's like walking through the forest except you may be allowed to warp out of the forest if necessary

7.10.20  12:44 am   How are your songs so sad and happy at the same time?

Â Â Â Â Â  could be a reflection of the world all around us

7.10.20  12:24 am   what is your political view on oatmeal 

Â Â Â Â Â  i have many oatmeal friends

7.10.20  12:24 am   Hey I'm A Fan And I Just Watched A Couple Videos. So Are You Currently working on a video?

Â Â Â Â Â  that doesn't sound like enough videos but whatever

7.10.20  12:17 am   Do you think air conditioners can love?

Â Â Â Â Â  that's what they're made for

7.10.20  12:01 am   what's the magic number

Â Â Â Â Â  i can't think of a number that isn't magic

7.9.20  11:49 pm   which word? the or it?

Â Â Â Â Â  can i use both

7.9.20  11:40 pm   What group of words best represent you?

Â Â Â Â Â  street signs

7.9.20  10:52 pm   Why does the month of july exist?

Â Â Â Â Â  to give you a chance to truly thrive

7.9.20  10:43 pm   (not really a question) thank you for being an awesome human and influencing me to do great things.

Â Â Â Â Â  thank you for your sudden outburst of friendliness

7.9.20  10:17 pm   Sooooo uhhhhh, when's that new video coming out

Â Â Â Â Â  what video

7.9.20  10:09 pm   how long did it take for you to develop your musical style?

Â Â Â Â Â  about the same amount it took for time to go by

7.9.20  10:08 pm   You said the clock on the wall in "slow down" was showing the time "all wrong", so what time was it actually?

Â Â Â Â Â  not true, you took it out of context. it says "telling it" all wrong, not showing it. the pace, is what specifically was wrong. that particular song seems to advocate a slower pace

7.9.20  10:07 pm   Is there even anything you're bad at?

Â Â Â Â Â  yes

7.9.20  10:07 pm   What is you're next video going to be about,

Â Â Â Â Â i have no idea

      I heard it's a HUGE project

Â Â Â Â Â  i am working on videomaking, not 1 huge video. the reason i am working on videomaking is because i am tired of only 1 video being huge. i want them all to be huge. after that, of course, i think it's clear what comes next and that's huge videos

7.9.20  10:00 pm   Has editing videos become easier because you have learned all of the tricks to make a good video, or harder because of trying to exceed your previous projects?

Â Â Â Â Â  it depends what season it is

7.9.20  9:55 pm   WHAT ARE YOU WORKING ON RIGHT NOW?

Â Â Â Â Â  inventing the wheel

7.9.20  9:42 pm   how did you feel when you predicted 2020 with "just did a bad thing"

Â Â Â Â Â  i didn't predict it, it was calendars

7.9.20  9:38 pm   are you a musical alien

Â Â Â Â Â  no

7.9.20  8:47 pm   Should I make music?

Â Â Â Â Â  sure. just don't be surprised if the definition of music seems to change while you're doing it. this is normal, and actually for your benefit

7.9.20  8:24 pm   how do you write songs that aren't terrible? i've got a few ideas swimming around in my head but when i actually try to write/sing it sounds cheesy & bad

Â Â Â Â Â  the secret here is to just write more songs. don't be afraid to make a certain percentage of them fail to meet valid song criteria in various jurisdictions

7.9.20  7:50 pm   Are you alive? And will you make and post a new song soon?

Â Â Â Â Â  that seems like the wrong number of songs for me, but i will look into it

7.9.20  6:55 pm   What does it feel like to be you?

Â Â Â Â Â  feels like being on a game show where you gotta move a mountain 1 piece at a time

7.9.20  6:14 pm   have you ever found yourself unable to come up with new ideas or work on old ones?

Â Â Â Â Â no

      if so any tips on how to break out of that kind of cycle?

Â Â Â Â Â  try walking to somewhere that is not considered walking distance

7.9.20  6:09 pm   you are too crazy for me to handle, what should i do

Â Â Â Â Â  you could use some calming down techniques

7.9.20  5:52 pm   bill i did a bad thing what should i do about it

Â Â Â Â Â  do a medium thing. it will seem great compared to the other thing

7.9.20  5:41 pm   What are you working on

Â Â Â Â Â  i can't tell you

7.9.20  4:53 pm   can i change this world even a bit by just playing games?   

Â Â Â Â Â  sure

7.9.20  4:49 pm   What's the most obscure instrument that you've used in a song?

Â Â Â Â Â  jeans maybe

7.9.20  4:32 pm   How do come up with music,

Â Â Â Â Â impossible. it can't be done

     you are a real inspiration to me 

Â Â Â Â Â

7.9.20  4:28 pm   before youtube, what did you do?

Â Â Â Â Â  create massive amounts of audio/visual content, or, depending on what stage i'm in, develop techniques toward creating massive amounts of audio/visual content. this is also still what i do

7.9.20  4:25 pm   What's the video your working on about?

Â Â Â Â Â  one of many practice videos, for me to develop my techniques

7.9.20  4:02 pm   are u a human

Â Â Â Â Â  oh that would explain a lot

Â Â Â Â Â i'm not sure

     
do your dreams inspire or influence your music? 

Â Â Â Â Â  sometimes

7.9.20  3:54 pm   Do toads exist?

Â Â Â Â Â  yes but i can't prove it right now

7.9.20  3:52 pm   What genre(s) of music inspired you the? most.

Â Â Â Â Â the inspiration mostly started when i forgot which one was which

     As another musician, I love the way you articulate your chords into the melody, there's just something so unique about it

Â Â Â Â Â

7.9.20  3:44 pm   i'm finally gonna do it! i'm gonna start making music! i have the basics (guitar, bass, keyboard, midi, mostly functional laptop, software) but is there any advice u could give me as a total beginner? 

Â Â Â Â Â  no, but if you try something and report back if there are any problems, then i may have some advice

Â Â Â Â Â  emotional

7.9.20  3:26 pm   Do you wear your hats sideways or backwards?

Â Â Â Â Â  hopefully invent a new angle if i can

7.9.20  3:20 pm   what month will you publish a new video?

Â Â Â Â Â  hopefully it would be more than 1 per month

7.9.20  3:15 pm   Whats the deal with airplane food?

Â Â Â Â Â  got to keep the plane nourished, so it can fly correctly

7.9.20  2:36 pm   is time travel possible?

Â Â Â Â Â  i think it's the only kind of travel that's possible

7.9.20  1:08 pm   at the same time that I want to study music theory, I can't seem to focus on learning - I get distracted after a while, can't find a path, and fall back into just making my own music with my ears' guidance. which of course isn't a problem in itself, it's just... interesting? I wonder why it's like that. anyway, now I've got into looking up other kinds of music theory which aren't a part of the western tradition and wow! it's so fucking interesting. not sure it's going to change anything in how I learn but at least I feel my horizons broadening. are you familiar with any sort of music theory outside of the western tradition? 

Â Â Â Â Â  yes but i lost track a long time ago of which things were western. there is so much in common, and yet still so many possibilities

7.9.20  1:04 pm   What do you do on your free time?

Â Â Â Â Â  my time is actually very expensive
